ARABIC: وَقُل رَّبِّ أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ هَمَزَٰتِ ٱلشَّيَٰطِينِ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Say: 'My Lord, I seek refuge with You from the goadings of the shaytans,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Say: "My Lord, I seek refuge in You from the evil promptings of the devils.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: And pray: "My Lord! I seek Your refuge from the suggestions of the evil ones;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Say, "Lord, I seek your protection against the strong temptations of the devils.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And submit, “My Lord! I seek Your refuge from the instigation of the devils.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And say: "My Lord! I seek refuge with You from the whisperings of the Shayatin."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And say: O my Lord! I seek refuge in Thee from the evil suggestions of the Shaitans;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And say: 'O my Lord, I take refuge in Thee from the evil suggestions of the Satans,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And say: My Lord! I seek refuge in Thee from suggestions of the evil ones,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and say, "My Lord, I seek refuge with You from the prompting of the devils.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And say thou: my Lord! I seek refuge with Thee against the whisperings of the satans;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Say, ‘My Lord! I seek Your protection from the promptings of devils,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And say "O my Lord! I seek refuge with Thee from the suggestions of the Evil Ones.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And say: "My Lord! I seek refuge with You from the whisperings (suggestions) of the Shayatin (devils).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: And say: 'O my Lord, I seek refuge in You from evil suggestions of the satans.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And say, “My Lord, I seek refuge with You from the urgings of the devils.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And say, "My Lord, I seek refuge in You from the incitements of the devils,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [23:97] And say: ‘My Lord, I seek protection in You from the promptings of devils, [from] their [evil] suggestions, which they whisper.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And say: My Lord! I seek refuge in Thee from suggestions) from the insinuations (of the evil ones) that bewitch humans,
